title: JSON schema for 'DataUtils.mkdata' function
description: Configuration file for making 'db' from 'spk' and 'vstim'.[dataflow](./dataflow.vsdx)

path.description: path of input file contains 'spk' and 'vstim'

trial_length_sec.description: length of each trial, in seconds. for dividing 'spk' or 'vstim' to sub-trials.

window_size_sec.description: length of the window of computing the psth, in seconds.

kernel_size_sec.description: length of gaussian kernel for smoothing psth, in seconds.

sample_size_sec.description: length of each input/output sample, in seconds.

sample_intersection_sec.description: length of intersection between each two input/output samples, in seconds.
